awd_abstract_narration: The University of Missouri @ Rolla will initiate a four-week,                   residential Young Scholars project in Engineering and Earth Science             for 20 students entering grade 12.                                                                                                                              Approximately 120 high school seniors will attend a one-week                    program (40 students/week for three consecutive weeks in June)                  designed to present science and engineering careers relating to                 minerals, materials, energy and the environment.  Twenty                        participants from this group will be selected to return for an                  additional three-week research experience; the particular                       discipline of the research will be selected to match student                    interest.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.inst_name: Missouri University of Science and Technology

perf_inst.perf_inst_name: Missouri University of Science and Technology
